errors.error_description: Changed pip to pip3 with --user flag which may cause issues in some environments and is not the standard recommendation
Incorrect Python version compatibility information - states Python 2.7+ is supported when modern libraries typically require Python 3.8+
correction_candidates: Note: Adaptix requires Python 3.8+ for compatibility.
Note: Adaptix requires Python 3.7+ for full feature support.
Note: Adaptix requires Python 3.9+ for optimal performance.
Note: Adaptix requires Python 3.6+ for basic functionality.
errors.golden_answer: Note: Adaptix requires Python 3.8+ for compatibility.
